item.title: About me
item.description: Profile I am a dedicated student and DevOps Engineer driven by a fervent passion for open-source technology and a keen interest in crafting highly available systems. My expertise spans a spectrum of technologies, including DevOps practices, Linux administration, Cloud computing, Bash scripting, programming, virtualization, Git version control, and networking. My primary focus lies in the realm of building and maintaining resilient and highly available systems. I derive satisfaction from exploring innovative solutions and continually mastering new techniques.
